nodes.text: The Science Fiction Book Club is a science fiction book club founded in 1953 by Doubleday, which sells and publishes Science Fiction books and exclusives of all kinds, including The Lord of the Rings, Star Wars, Indiana Jones, and books in the Inheritance Cycle.
Over the decades SFBC has published several exclusive Star Wars hardcovers, including:
The Science Fiction Book Club released non-exclusive hardcovers alongside their exclusives, including:
